VLIB_calcBlobMinEnclosedCircle

Detailed Description


Functions

int32_t VLIB_calcBlobMinEnclosedCircle (int32_t numPolygonPt, const VLIB_blobAnalysis_point *polygonBoundary, VLIB_blobAnalysis_circle *circle)

Function Documentation

int32_t VLIB_calcBlobMinEnclosedCircle ( int32_t  numPolygonPt,
const VLIB_blobAnalysis_point *  polygonBoundary,
VLIB_blobAnalysis_circle *  circle 
)

Description:
This function finds the minimlal enclosed circle of a blob. The enclosed polygon parameters (which is generated by VLIB_calcBlobMinEnclosedPolygon) of the blob are input to this module. The enclosed polygon parameters consist of the number and position of polygon vertices. The parameters of the enclosed circle which consist of center position(x,y) and radius are output in structure VLIB_blobAnalysis_circle
Parameters:
[in] numPolygonPt The number of vertices of the enclosed polygon (Q32.0)
[in] polygonBoundary The pointer to vertices position of the enclosed polygon (VLIB_blobAnalysis_point)
[out] circle The pointer to minimal enclosed circle parameters (VLIB_blobAnalysis_circle)
Assumptions:
  • I/O buffers are assumed to be not aliased.
Implementation Notes:
  • This code is fully interruptible
  • This code is compatible with C66 floating-point processors
Performance Notes:
NA
